Level: 2
Category: Other
Time: 1 hour
Component Cost: See Alchemical Item
Market Price: 100 gp
Key Skill: Arcana or Thievery (no check)

A tanglefoot bag contains a sticky gel that expands and hardens when exposed to air. The bag containing the gel is specially sealed to explode on impact.

Tanglefoot Bag
Level 2 Uncommon

This small leather bag or satchel contains a sticky gel that can immobilize foes.

Price: 25 gp
Alchemical Item

Power (Consumable): Standard Action. Make an attack: Ranged 5/10; +5 vs. Reflex; on a hit, the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn, at which point the creature is then slowed until the end of its next turn.
